metadata.title: CVE-2021-21835 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input when decoding the atom associatedwith the “csgp” FOURCC can cause an integer overflow due to uncheckedarithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causes memorycorruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
